General_Description: '''Red-Tainted Gold''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "Without [[drachma]]e, [[Athens|Athenians]] won't be able to fight back."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra looted Athenian [[Treasure chest|Nation Treasures]] all over [[Greece]], and was rewarded for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Blood Money]] and [[Surprise Bankruptcy]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
